tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE UserDemographics (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR,
    country VARCHAR,
    preferences JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE user_demographics (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE preference_history (
    user_id INT,
    genre VARCHAR(20),
    watch_count INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_demographics(user_id)
)

CREATE TABLE media_recommendations (
    recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    media_title VARCHAR(100),
    genre VARCHAR(20),
    confidence_score FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_demographics(user_id)
)

CREATE TABLE MediaRecommendations (
    recommendation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    media_title VARCHAR(100),
    genre VARCHAR(50),
    rating FLOAT,
    recommendation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE MediaDetails (
    media_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    media_title VARCHAR(100),
    genre VARCHAR(50),
    release_year INT,
    language VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE demographic_data (user_id INT,
    income DECIMAL(10,2),
    education_level VARCHAR(50),
    marital_status VARCHAR(20),
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE recommendation_logs (log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    media_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    action VARCHAR(20),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (media_id) REFERENCES media(media_id)
);
